title: The two noble kinsmen presented at the Blackfriers by the Kings Maiesties servants, with great applause: written by the memorable worthies of their time; Mr. Iohn Fletcher, and Mr. William Shakspeare. Gent.
author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
publisher: By Tho. Cotes, for Iohn Waterson: and are to be sold at the signe of the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: The words "Mr. Iohn Fletcher, and Mr. William Shakspeare." are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
